results.title: A systematic review on pharmacokinetics, cardiovascular outcomes and safety profiles of statins in cirrhosis
results.text_hl: The pooled estimate of @<m>DISEASE_Rhabdomyolysis</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D012206 @@@rhabdomyolysis@@@ or @DISEASE_Muscular_Diseases @DISEASE_MESH:D009135 @@@muscle injury@@@ with @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ 40 mg was 4%, while it was 2% for @<m>DISEASE_Rhabdomyolysis</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D012206 @@@rhabdomyolysis@@@.

citations.NLM: Sung S, Al-Karaghouli M, Kalainy S, Cabrera Garcia L, Abraldes JG. A systematic review on pharmacokinetics, cardiovascular outcomes and safety profiles of statins in cirrhosis BMC Gastroenterol. 2021 Mar 16;21(1):120. PMID: 33726685
citations.BibTeX: @article{33726685, title={A systematic review on pharmacokinetics, cardiovascular outcomes and safety profiles of statins in cirrhosis}, author={Sung S and Al-Karaghouli M and Kalainy S and Cabrera Garcia L and Abraldes JG}, journal={BMC Gastroenterol}, volume={21}, number={1}, pages={120}}

results.title: Reporting of Drug-Induced Myopathies Associated with the Combination of Statins and Daptomycin: A Disproportionality Analysis Using the US Food and Drug Administration Adverse Event Reporting System
results.text_hl: Statins in combination with @CHEMICAL_Daptomycin @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017576 @@@daptomycin@@@ might also increase the reporting rate of @<m>DISEASE_Rhabdomyolysis</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D012206 @@@rhabdomyolysis@@@, especially with @CHEMICAL_Rosuvastatin_Calcium @CHEMICAL_MESH:D000068718 @@@rosuvastatin@@@, @CHEMICAL_Atorvastatin @CHEMICAL_MESH:D000069059 @@@atorvastatin@@@, and @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@.

citations.NLM: Wei C, Yin W, He Z, Wu B. Reporting of Drug-Induced Myopathies Associated with the Combination of Statins and Daptomycin: A Disproportionality Analysis Using the US Food and Drug Administration Adverse Event Reporting System J Clin Med. 2023 May 18;12(10):. PMID: 37240654
citations.BibTeX: @article{37240654, title={Reporting of Drug-Induced Myopathies Associated with the Combination of Statins and Daptomycin: A Disproportionality Analysis Using the US Food and Drug Administration Adverse Event Reporting System}, author={Wei C and Yin W and He Z and Wu B}, journal={J Clin Med}, volume={12}, number={10}}

results.title: Rhabdomyolysis and statins: a pharmacovigilance comparative study between statins.
results.text_hl: Among 10 657 reports with @<m>DISEASE_Rhabdomyolysis</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D012206 @@@rhabdomyolysis@@@ with statins, @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ was the highest risk statin in comparison with others: ROR=2.20 (2.11-2.29).

citations.NLM: Montastruc JL. Rhabdomyolysis and statins: a pharmacovigilance comparative study between statins. Br J Clin Pharmacol. 2023 Apr 27;():. PMID: 37186323
citations.BibTeX: @article{37186323, title={Rhabdomyolysis and statins: a pharmacovigilance comparative study between statins.}, author={Montastruc JL}, journal={Br J Clin Pharmacol}}

results.title: Severe rhabdomyolysis induced by possible drug-drug interaction between Ribociclib and Simvastatin.
results.text_hl: Severe @<m>DISEASE_Rhabdomyolysis</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D012206 @@@rhabdomyolysis@@@ induced by possible drug-drug interaction between @CHEMICAL_ribociclib @CHEMICAL_MESH:C000589651 @@@Ribociclib@@@ and @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@Simvastatin@@@.

citations.NLM: Streicher C, Daulange A, Madranges N, Vayre L. Severe rhabdomyolysis induced by possible drug-drug interaction between Ribociclib and Simvastatin. J Oncol Pharm Pract. 2021 Apr;27(3):722-726. PMID: 32727321

results.title: Corrigendum: Severe toxic rhabdomyolysis under combined palbociclib and simvastatin treatment: A case report
results.text_hl: Corrigendum: Severe toxic @<m>DISEASE_Rhabdomyolysis</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D012206 @@@rhabdomyolysis@@@ under combined @CHEMICAL_palbociclib @CHEMICAL_MESH:C500026 @@@palbociclib@@@ and @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ treatment: A case report

results.title: Statin-induced rhabdomyolysis from azithromycin interaction in a patient with heterozygous SLCO1B1 polymorphism.
results.text_hl: The combination increases @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ serum concentrations significantly, inducing @<m>DISEASE_Rhabdomyolysis</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D012206 @@@rhabdomyolysis@@@.

citations.NLM: Burns H, Russell L, Cox ZL. Statin-induced rhabdomyolysis from azithromycin interaction in a patient with heterozygous SLCO1B1 polymorphism. J Clin Pharm Ther. 2021 Jun;46(3):853-855. PMID: 33277702

results.text_hl: Severe @DISEASE_Drug_Related_Side_Effects_and_Adverse_Reactions @DISEASE_MESH:D064420 @@@toxic@@@ @<m>DISEASE_Rhabdomyolysis</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D012206 @@@rhabdomyolysis@@@ under combined @CHEMICAL_palbociclib @CHEMICAL_MESH:C500026 @@@palbociclib@@@ and @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ treatment: A case report

results.title: First Reported Case of Rhabdomyolysis Associated with Concomitant Use of Cyclosporin, Diltiazem, and Simvastatin
results.text_hl: First Reported Case of @<m>DISEASE_Rhabdomyolysis</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D012206 @@@Rhabdomyolysis@@@ Associated with Concomitant Use of @CHEMICAL_Cyclosporine @CHEMICAL_MESH:D016572 @@@Cyclosporin@@@, @CHEMICAL_Diltiazem @CHEMICAL_MESH:D004110 @@@Diltiazem@@@, and @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@Simvastatin@@@

results.title: Rhabdomyolysis Induced by the Interaction Between Ribociclib and Statins- Case Report and Literature Review
results.text_hl: We describe a case of a 73-year-old @SPECIES_9606 @@@woman@@@ who developed @<m>DISEASE_Rhabdomyolysis</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D012206 @@@rhabdomyolysis@@@ following a drug-drug interaction due to the concomitant use of @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ and @CHEMICAL_ribociclib @CHEMICAL_MESH:C000589651 @@@ribociclib@@@.

citations.NLM: Badran O, Abu Amna M, Turgeman I, Bar-Sela G. Rhabdomyolysis Induced by the Interaction Between Ribociclib and Statins- Case Report and Literature Review Breast Cancer (Dove Med Press). 2023;15():47-50. PMID: 36718280
citations.BibTeX: @article{36718280, title={Rhabdomyolysis Induced by the Interaction Between Ribociclib and Statins- Case Report and Literature Review}, author={Badran O and Abu Amna M and Turgeman I and Bar-Sela G}, journal={Breast Cancer (Dove Med Press)}, volume={15}, pages={47-50}}

results.title: Safety of Concomitant Use of Tacrolimus and High-Intensity Statins in Liver and Kidney Transplant Recipients.
results.text_hl: Due to increased risk of @DISEASE_Myalgia @DISEASE_MESH:D063806 @@@myalgia@@@ and @<m>DISEASE_Rhabdomyolysis</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D012206 @@@rhabdomyolysis@@@ associated with the use of @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ with @CHEMICAL_Cyclosporine @CHEMICAL_MESH:D016572 @@@cyclosporine@@@, use of high-intensity 3-hydroxy-3-methylglutaryl Coenzyme A reductase inhibitors (statins) is often avoided in transplant recipients.

citations.NLM: Klein K, Klimatcheva M, Hall R, Patel R, Speeg KV, Guerrero J, Long C. Safety of Concomitant Use of Tacrolimus and High-Intensity Statins in Liver and Kidney Transplant Recipients. Prog Transplant. 2025 Sep;35(3):178-182. PMID: 40576487
citations.BibTeX: @article{40576487, title={Safety of Concomitant Use of Tacrolimus and High-Intensity Statins in Liver and Kidney Transplant Recipients.}, author={Klein K and Klimatcheva M and Hall R and Patel R and Speeg KV and Guerrero J and Long C}, journal={Prog Transplant}, volume={35}, number={3}, pages={178-182}}
